settings.title: Boost Energy
settings.content: CoQ10, nature's energy powerhouse, bolsters mitochondrial function, enhancing overall vitality and combating fatigue.

settings.title: Enhance Cognition
settings.content: Essential fatty acids and vitamins to support optimal brain health, ensuring improved focus and mental clarity throughout demanding tasks.

settings.title: Improve Exercise Performance
settings.content: Combining nutrients like Creatine, L-Carnitine, and Taurine provides optimal muscle function, ensuring peak performance during physical exertion.

settings.title: Combat Mid-Day Fatigue
settings.content: Critical nutrients like Stearic Acid and CoQ10 stimulate energy production to support elevated energy levels all day.

settings.title: Bioavailable Nutrients
settings.content: Highly bioavailable micronutrients paired with essential fatty acids deliver superior absorption, maximizing nutrient utiilization and overall benefits.

IS THE ENERGY STACK FOR ME?

This stack is ideal for those seeking powerful nutritional support to optimize energy levels on workdays, weekends, and those moments in between.

settings.quote: I don’t crash in the afternoons, I’m still full of energy late into the evenings, and having better quality sleep at the same time!
settings.author: Edward W.

settings.supporting_product_description: Beef Organs includes liver, heart, pancreas, spleen, and kidney. It is nature's ultimate multivitamin. Foundational support for overall health, vitality, and energy.
Firestarter includes suet (perinephric kidney fat) and helps to increase energy, improve exercise performance, mood, insulin sensitivity, and mitochondrial fat burning.

settings.primary_product_description: Warrior is the foundational supplement included in the Energy Stack. It provides unique and essential support found in grass-fed and grass-finished heart and liver. These powerful organs include 12+ powerful nutrients to help reach your goals.

settings.title: CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Heart is nature's richest source of CoQ10, a nutrient shown to improve mitochondrial function and energy production, and to enhance exercise performance.

settings.title: Creatine
settings.nutrient_description: Heart is one of nature's richest sources of this nutrient, which is crucial for muscle growth and recovery, and essential for energy production in the muscles.

settings.title: L-Carnitine
settings.nutrient_description: Required to produce energy (ATP) in the muscles, and to protect against muscle damage. Improves sport and gym performance in elite athletes.

settings.title: Choline
settings.nutrient_description: A key nutrient involved in muscle neurotransmitter synthesis.

settings.title: Glutamine
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial amino acid required to speed up muscle recovery and reduce delayed-onset muscle soreness.

settings.title: Iron
settings.nutrient_description: A critical trace mineral required for red blood cell formation and the repair of muscle tissue.

settings.title: Copper, Biotin
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as the health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Lipase, Protease, and Amylase
settings.nutrient_description: Enzymes to help break down macronutrients like fat, protein and carbohydrates.

settings.title: Colipase, Trypsin, and Pancreatic Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Support the activation of enzymes needed to break down protein and help with food allergies by improving digestion.

settings.title: Riboflavin, Folate, B12, and Choline
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for red blood cell formation, brain, reproductive, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Anserine, Carnosine, Taurine, and L-carnitine
settings.nutrient_description: Supports brain, immune, and cardiovascular health, as well as muscle recovery.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid found in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Vitamins A, D, E, K2
settings.nutrient_description: Get these vitamins in a super bioavailable form that play critical roles in overall immune and bone health.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2. This peptide is involved in immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Hepcidin Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: A peptide directly involved in iron metabolism as well as the innate immune response.

settings.title: Kidney-specific Peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Reduce the concentration of oxalates in the urine and calcium deposits in the renal tissue, as well as preventing free-radical induced damage.

settings.title: Dwarf Open Reading Frame Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as DWORF, this peptide improves cardiac function and contractility.

settings.title: B12
settings.nutrient_description: Necessary for proper cell division, red blood cell production, neurotransmitter formation, and optimal exercise performance.

settings.title: Selenium
settings.nutrient_description: A critical mineral for thyroid function (iodothyronine deiodinanses) and immune health/antioxidant defense (glutathione peroxidase, thioredoxin reductase).

settings.title: Heme Iron
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for brain health, energy, and exercise performance, as well as immune function.

settings.title: Niacin
settings.nutrient_description: A B3 vitamin essential for cardiovascular health, mood, cognition, and energy.

settings.title: Splenin, Tuftsin, and Splenopentin Peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Exclusively found in splenic tissue which enhances immune function.

settings.title: Gastrin-releasing Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as GRP, this peptide is found in pancreatic tissue and supports digestive processes by stimulating the release of enzymes, bicarbonate, and fluids.

settings.title: Stearic Acid
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial fatty acid that turns on mitochondrial fat-burning cells to help with weight and energy.

settings.title: Essential fatty acids
settings.nutrient_description: Support immune and cardiovascular health, as well as healthy weight management.

settings.section_description: The combined power of Warrior, Beef Organs, and Firestarter includes vital and potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: I feel AMAZING! I can tell a difference  in my energy level and I just feel over all GREAT!
settings.author: Krista C.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: Our Energy Stack aims to combine nutrients to support optimal energy levels, whether at work or play.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the Energy Stack?
settings.answer: This stack is ideal for those seeking powerful nutritional support to achieve optimal energy levels on a daily basis.

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids that support optimal energy levels.
